title: [DEVOPS] Add monitoring and APM integration
body:
## Problem
No Application Performance Monitoring or comprehensive observability.

## Tasks
- [ ] Evaluate APM solutions (Sentry/DataDog/New Relic)
- [ ] Implement frontend RUM
- [ ] Add backend APM
- [ ] Configure error tracking
- [ ] Set up dashboards
- [ ] Create alerting rules

## Acceptance Criteria
- Full stack monitoring
- Error tracking active
- Performance dashboards
- Alerting configured

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 13 story points
